titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 339) to prevent frivolous lawsuits against the manufacturers, distributors, or sellers of food or non-alcoholic beverage products that comply with applicable statutory and regulatory requirements.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-435, by Mr. Sessions.

It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on the Judiciary now printed in the bill.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 152.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 552.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/10/2004--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 339) concerning lawsuits against manufacturers, distributors, or sellers of food or non-alcoholic beverage products that comply with applicable statutory and regulatory requirements.
